Question
========
  
At a randomly chosen moment, a group of children is asked how they feel at the moment. The results are displayed in the bar chart below. Which conclusion about the results is correct?

![](vufgb-bargraph-001-en-graph-01.png) 
  
Answerlist
----------
* The variable Feeling is an ordinal variable.
* The variable Feeling is approximately normally distributed.
* The percentage of children that feels happy lies between 80 and 90%.
* At the y-axis the absolute frequencies are displayed.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
